      • addSubscription

        public void addSubscription(java.lang.String timeEditCode,
                   java.lang.String higCode,
                   java.lang.String name)
        Add a subscription to the database.
        Parameters:
        timeEditCode - The code used by TimeEdit to identify the course. Example: "18347.183"
        higCode - The HiG code of the course. Example: "IMT2020"
        name - The actual name of the course.

      • deleteSubscription

        public void deleteSubscription(int id)
        Delete a subscription from the database
        Parameters:
        id - The unique index of the subscription item.
